author: Steve Binder <email@stevebinder.com>
description: Orchestrate your React/Redux apps with this simple library.
name: reactdux

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && NODE_ENV=production webpack --display=errors-only && echo 'BUILT!'
scripts.build:dev: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && NODE_ENV=development webpack
scripts.release: git checkout master && git pull origin master && npm run build && npm publish && 'RELEASED!'
